TEXT.S:
= Blangaw = Gaga mniq Sincuseyn Ufungsyang ka alang Blangaw. 114 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 300 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 95% niqan 286 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 5% niqan 14 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal 93%, Saysiyat 2%.
Pusu nniqan alang Mniq saw alang Blangaw seejiq o seejiq Scyaru.
Nniqan alang Nyusan Sincu nsgan Wufung alang Blangaw.
Gasuc nniqan Mniq daya alang Cingcyuan, mnuda elug bling ini bsiyaq do kika dhuq alang Blangaw da.
Tiri lnglingay Bbaraw dgiyaq o 600 knjisan, sttu kana.
Pgkla patas rmigaw Mgrig rulu:Tduwa su muda elug Shentaw 122 syeyn(elug Nancing), kndadax dgiyaq Cutung mtmay Wufung, mnuda elug bling do kika ini bsiyaq do kika dhuq alang Blangaw da. Ppanun basu: Tduwa peapa basu Sincu 1039 ni 3039 musa Wufung, dhuq Blangaw do tucing basu da!
Sjiqan klgan nealang Atayal.
Djiyun kari Kari Atayal ni Tlu.
Pnaah alang Mnrmuxan nihung siida, kmciyux Tanah Tunux ka seejiq Scyaru, tnhjil kska yayung Matara, bukuy do asi nniqan ruwan dgiyaq ka Kisacu Nihung, ini bi sleexan kmlawa, kika dsun kana seejiq alang miyah breenux ka bukuy alang, dhuq ssiyaw sapah nniqan kisacu Blangaw hiya, pnhyugan kingal alang, kika tmhangan dha Blangaw.
